USA: War of the Grand Alliance: The war was ended by the Treaty of Ryswick.
Sweden: The castle of Tre Kronor burns down, destroying a significant portion of Sweden's national library and royal archives.
Poland: Election of Augustus II the Strong
Coronation of Augustus II the Strong
Haiti: Spain signed the Treaty of Ryswick, under whose terms she ceded the western third of Hispaniola to France.
Germany: The elector of Saxony was elected King Augustus II the Strong of the Polish–Lithuanian Commonwealth.
France: Treaty of Ryswick: End of the Nine Years' War between France and the Grand Alliance. Territorial changes were made in Europe and the colonial empires of the countries involved.
